summary: This adds a dwarven style home all in one cell with all of the essentials - forge, smelter, wheel, workbench, tanning rack. Brought back crates as containers! Has a living quarters with six open beds for companions.  Also has a nice size bedroom for the player with a good amount of mannequin and weapon displays. A library, kitchen, enchanting/alche
descriptionHtml:
This adds a dwarven style home all in one cell with all of the essentials - forge, smelter, wheel, workbench, tanning rack. Brought back crates as containers! Has a living quarters with six open beds for companions.  Also has a nice size bedroom for the player with a good amount of mannequin and weapon displays. A library, kitchen, enchanting/alchemy areas as well as a training room. Lastly there is a cave under the house but accessible through the training room that has a few extra features. Exterior has a nice entrance and a stable for your horse. It is located in the mountains not too far from Valthume. Map marker is visible but undiscovered. I only encountered one problem that I couldn\'t figure out which is related to the ore in the cave. As long as you have a weapon out when activating it, the ore will be mined but if not, Dovah will just stand over it clueless.

Enjoy and thank you for downloading!
author: aladar111
